comments:
Eclipse 3.1 M6 with EMF I200503310700

When creating a new EMF project using the wizard, an NPE occurs in the codegen
which causes the creation of a project with no .classpath.  This basically makes
the project useless.

Here is the full exception:

java.lang.NullPointerException

Bryan, is this a Linux only bug?  I can't reproduce this...

I was able to reproduce this on OS X.

Here are the exact steps I'm using

New -> Project -> EMF Project
Give it a name
Create empty project
Finish
Bryan, thanks for the more precise steps.  I can produce on XP now.

I was not able to reproduce this problem on M5a, so it's looking like a
regression in the base support we are using.  I'll investigate further.

Brian, 

The problems are caused by the new jarred plugin format.  I've committed changes
that should fix the problem.

Thanks for reporting this! We might not have noticed for a while...
